quotes.quote: The shaft of the arrow had been feathered with one of the eagle's own plumes. We often give our enemies the means of our own destruction.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote:
He who has a thousand friends has not a friend to spare,
And he who has one enemy will meet him everywhere.
quotes.author: Ali ibn-Abi-Talib

quotes.quote: Above all things, never be afraid. The enemy who forces you to retreat is himself afraid of you at that very moment.
quotes.author: Andre Maurois

quotes.quote: Observe your enemies, for they first find out your faults.
quotes.author: Antisthenes

quotes.quote: A wise man gets more use from his enemies than a fool from his friends.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: Love your enemies; for they shall tell you all your faults.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: I do not regret one professional enemy I have made. Any actor who doesn't dare to make an enemy should get out of the business.
quotes.author: Bette Davis

quotes.quote: The meeting of two personalities is like the contact of two chemical substances: if there is any reaction, both are transformed.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: He hasn't an enemy in the world - but all his friends hate him.
quotes.author: Eddie Cantor

quotes.quote: Never explain--your friends do not need it and your enemies will not believe you anyway.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: You can discover what your enemy fears most by observing the means he uses to frighten you.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: At times one remains faithful to a cause only because its opponents do not cease to be insipid.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Rejoice not at thine enemy's fall - but don't rush to pick him up either.
quotes.author: Jewish Proverb

quotes.quote: Forgive your enemies, but never forget their names.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Now the trumpet summons us again�not as a call to bear arms, though arms we need; not as a call to battle, though embattled we are�but a call to bear the burden of a long twilight struggle, year in and year out, "rejoicing in hope, patient in tribulation"�a struggle against the common enemies of man: tyranny, poverty, disease, and war itself.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: The enemy is anybody who's going to get you killed, no matter which side he's on.
quotes.author: Joseph Heller

quotes.quote: The rule is perfect: in all matters of opinion our adversaries are insane.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: If you want to make peace, you don't talk to your friends. You talk to your enemies.
quotes.author: Moshe Dayan

quotes.quote: Never interrupt your enemy when he is making a mistake.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: A man cannot be too careful in the choice of his enemies.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: We can learn even from our enemies.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: Use your enemy's hand to catch a snake.
quotes.author: Persian Proverb

quotes.quote: Treat your friend as if he might become an enemy.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: Reveal not every secret you have to a friend, for how can you tell but that friend may hereafter become an enemy. And bring not all mischief you are able to upon an enemy, for he may one day become your friend.
quotes.author: Saadi

quotes.quote: It is hard to fight an enemy who has outposts in your head.
quotes.author: Sally Kempton

quotes.quote: Money can't buy friends, but it can get you a better class of enemy.
quotes.author: Spike Milligan

quotes.quote: Friends may come and go, but enemies accumulate.
quotes.author: Thomas Jones
